name: laposte-okapi-sdk
description: La Poste Open API client SDK for JavaScript / nodejs / browsers

scripts.build:scripts: mkdir -p client && browserify -r ./lib/okapi-sdk.js:okapi-sdk -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o client/okapi-sdk.js && uglifyjs --compress -o client/okapi-sdk.min.js -- client/okapi-sdk.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- -- -R spec && cat dist/coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rimraf dist/coverage

author: Developer <developer@laposte.io> (https://developer.laposte.fr/)
